availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky day laborer. Elliot County, Kentucky native. Son of Mordecai Walker Sr. and Margaret Archey Walker. Married Margaret Walker.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 280. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Sub district 2, East Little Sandy, p. 76. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 49.
